title: T-HSAB (Tunisian Hate Speech)
slice_notes: Tunisian Arabic hate speech dataset with three classes: normal, abusive, hate. Abusive and hate mapped to Toxic.
pii_risk: Low - Contains user-generated text but no personal identifiers
processing_notes: Canonicalized with label mapping: hate/abusive->Toxic, normal->Neutral. Some rows filtered during processing.
